newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian Mafia boss begins cooperating with police.
newsitem.headline: Italian Mafia boss begins cooperating with police.

text.p: Mafia boss Giovanni Brusca, one of the most wanted mobsters in Sicily before his arrest in May, has begun cooperating with anti-Mafia investigators, Italian television reported on Friday.
It quoted judicial sources as saying that Brusca, charged with the murder in 1992 of anti-Mafia magistrate Giovanni Falcone among other mob crimes, had been given urgent special protection measures.
